name: Nook
description:
Put your spatial thinking skills to the test in this puzzle-arcade game!

Features:
100+ unique shapes
3 level types
Power-ups
Endless play
No ads or in-app purchases


How to play

1. Each level features a shape in two different rotations.
2. Imagine you're moving around the cube and viewing the shape inside it from all of its corners.
3. Tap the corner, from which the bottom shape can be seen as the top shape.

Solve levels fast to get power-ups!
